text: Jerry Chan Man (; born 4 October 1993) is a Macau footballer. He currently plays as a defender for Liga de Elite club Benfica de Macau. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Benfica de Macau *Liga de Elite: 2015, 2016 ===Individual=== *2015-16 Macau Footballer of the Year ==Personal life== In addition to playing football part time, Chan is a firefighter in Macau. ==International goals== {| class="wikitable" |- !
